fork_status_and_schedule.highlight: BPO1 on Sepolia completed successfully, BPO2 scheduled in 9 hours
Hoodi fork activation scheduled for same day as BPO2
BPO1 on Hoodi scheduled for one week from meeting date

critical_infrastructure.highlight: Holesky testnet deprecation imminent - expected to stop finalizing within hours
Holesky officially stopped finalizing during the meeting
L2s using Sepolia as production testnets affected by Holesky removal

client_updates.highlight: 60 million gas limit confirmed as default for most clients
Nethermind fixed performance bottleneck discovered in compute tests
Custom Docker file with detailed tracing capabilities developed for profiling

testing_progress.highlight: BAL release with 20 test cases covering Coinbase withdrawals and edge cases
Bug discovered that escaped all three clients in early BAL testing
BAL DevNet-0 to be ready by end of day with Geth, Nethermind, Besu, and Reth
New consensus specs release with additional ePBS tests for COAS

documentation.highlight: Markdown document proposed for tracking test cases - 60 lines vs 2300 lines of Python
Discussion on linking test case documents to EIPs for better visibility

organizational.highlight: Weld project merging execution-spec-tests into execution-specs repository
Osaka contributors can start PRing to default execution-specs branch immediately
Next ePBS breakout call scheduled for November 7th

action_items.action: Update nodes and stay online for Hoodi fork activation
Clean up devnet 3 nodes that have run out of disk space
Share custom Docker file documentation once merged
Complete BAL DevNet-0 setup by end of day
Open two issues on execution APIs repo for error code and transaction type resolution
Continue EIP-7610 discussion async and evaluate implementation options

decisions.decision: L2s should deploy on DevNets rather than wait for testnets
60 million gas limit is confirmed as the default for all clients
Proposed structure change to attestations for ePBS was rejected
All EL testing PRs and issues should now go to execution-specs repository, not execution-spec-tests

targets.target: Sepolia BPO2 activation in 9 hours from meeting time
BPO1 on Hoodi scheduled for November 3, 2025
DevNet-3 to remain online for at least another month
BAL DevNet-0 launch by end of October 27, 2025
